section.title: Blame annotations
section.para:
The Git tooling in Eclipse allows displaying annotations to see which line was last changed by whom and which commit. To enable this, right-click on your file and select
Team Show Annotations
.
Afterwards you can place the mouse on the left side of the editor and a popup dialog shows the commit information and the change applied by the shown commit.

tip.para:
To ignore whitespace changes in the Git blame annotations in Eclipse, select
Window Preferences Team Git
and select Ignore whitespace changes .
